message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm asking for $14,000 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested but $14,000 is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $13,000. What do you think?
Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I appreciate your interest. I can come down to $13,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested!
